seed_pair.target: Disfruto la oportunidad de practicar hablar contigo
seed_pair.known: I enjoy the chance to practise speaking with you.

S0196: Have you heard the latest idea?
S0197: My son works as a teacher.
S0198: Mi hija trabaja para el consejo.
My daughter works for the council.
S0199: Mi amigo solía trabajar en una oficina.
My friend used to work in an office.
S0200: Dicen que quieren asegurarse de que terminemos todo a tiempo.
They say they want to make sure that we finish everything in time.
S0201: Queríamos saber qué iba a pasar
We wanted to know what was going to happen.
S0202: Nadie estaba seguro de cómo responder la pregunta
Nobody was sure how to answer the question.
S0203: ¿Qué harías si te pidiera que me ayudaras?
What would you do if I asked you to help me?
S0204: Quería que ella te ayudara a tratar con los arreglos
I wanted her to help you to deal with the arrangements.
S0205: He olvidado la palabra que estaba intentando decir
I've forgotten the word I was trying to say.

_instructions.task: Generate 12-15 practice phrases per LEGO using recent seed_pairs as pattern inspiration
_instructions.pattern_matching: Use recent_seed_pairs as full sentence examples showing patterns and vocabulary
_instructions.overgeneration: Generate 12-15 phrases knowing some may be filtered by GATE validation
_instructions.quality: Semantic meaning + syntactic correctness + pedagogical value
_instructions.format: Array format: ["English phrase", "Spanish phrase", null, lego_count]
